TopicTitle: KSP stuff in augmented reality applications

Articles.Content:
I've been toying around with augmented reality applications today (such as this one http://augmentedev.com) and I'm curious to see if anyone has some 3D models related to KSP to share so they could be used for this.

There is one model of a weird Kerbal uploaded to the server of this particular application. I'd like to see planetary bodies, crafts, etc.
